name: Annaconda
overview: An extremely difficult shooter\platformer in a forest ruins setting. You, the hunter, use your bow and arrows to survive a forest filled with strange monsters intent on your destruction. When you are ready to go underground you must use your hunter powers to turn into the faster, but more vulnerable, slithering snake. Gathering treasures increases your scores. Published as Constrictor in Italy and published in Logica 2000 n.89 (1989).
